### Government Tender Announcement: Dental Ceramics Services
#### Reference Number: cb-188-40324509
#### Amendment Number: 1
#### Solicitation Number: 4569784
#### Publication Date: 2023-11-23
#### Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-08T14:00:00

### Contract Description
Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) intends to award a contract for Dental Ceramics Services to a pre-identified supplier. The contract is to provide dental laboratory services to all sites in the Ontario Region, involving the fabrication, repair, and rebuild of dentures.

### Contract Objectives

Provide essential dental laboratory services to individuals incarcerated in Ontario Region's correctional facilities.

### Deliverables

- Provide dental laboratory services in accordance with generally accepted practices and professional standards.
- Meet the correctional facilities' needs for fabrication, repair, and rebuild of dentures.
- Implement good environmental practices (double-sided printing, recycled content of 30%, certified from sustainably managed forests).
- Produce reports on referrals and facility usage.

### Contract Duration

Proposed contract term: Five (5) years, from February 1, 2024 to February 1, 2029, with an estimated contract value of $712,840.83 (GST/HST extra).

### Evaluation Criteria

Proponents must demonstrate a minimum of two (2) years of experience in providing dental ceramics services, with a valid license from the College of Dental Technologists of Ontario.

### Allowable Period for Submission of Statement of Capabilities

December 8, 2023 at 14:00 (Daylight Saving Time).

### Contact Information

Regional Contract Administrator

Kingston, Ontario
K7L 4Y8

### IMPORTANT NOTICE

As this is an emergency procurement, interested suppliers may not be provided with written evaluation criteria. Only experienced service providers in dental ceramics services will be considered. No confidentiality, environmental, or trade agreements exist. The Government of Canada reserves the right to correct any errors or omissions in this notice. By submitting your statement of capabilities, you signify your agreement to all terms and conditions of this announcement. Reply
